definition: cavity of body/barrel (e.g. engine cylinder)/compartment/tune/accent of speech

sentences.english: Duggan, a father of four, died of a single gunshot wound to the chest, an inquest at north London Coroner's Court heard on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 验尸报告称，这位四岁小孩的父亲被枪击中胸腔致死。

sentences.english: When pneumothorax occurs temporally with menstrual cycles, catamenial pneumothorax should be suspected.
sentences.chinese: 当气胸发生在月经来潮时要怀疑胸腔子宫内膜异位症。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the value of ADA in differential diagnosis of hydrothorax.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察胸水ADA对胸腔积液鉴别诊断的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To explore effects of pleural space drainage plus drug infusion in treating tuberculous empyema.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸腔闭式引流法治疗结核性脓胸的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To study the acute effects of talc instillation intrapleurally.
sentences.chinese: 研究胸腔内注入滑石粉浆的急性反应。

sentences.english: Video-assisted thoracoscopy is a safer and less invasive modality of therapy.
sentences.chinese: 胸腔内视镜是一个安全且较不侵犯的治疗方式。

sentences.english: Thoracoscopy revealed multiple diffuse lung cysts.
sentences.chinese: 胸腔镜下看见弥漫性多发肺囊泡。

sentences.english: I could feel the beating of the blades in my chest.
sentences.chinese: 我能够感觉到胸腔里肺叶的跳动。

sentences.english: The bones of his rib cage were exposed, and deeper, black congealing blood pooled.
sentences.chinese: 他胸腔的骨头开放了，很深，黑色的凝结血形成血塘。

sentences.english: Draw the skin overlying your front ribs away from your sternum.
sentences.chinese: 胸腔的皮肤扩张远离胸骨。

sentences.english: The internal organs inside the thoracic and abdominal cavities are often called viscera.
sentences.chinese: 位于胸腔及腹腔的内部器官，通常称为内脏。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of treat spontaneous pneumothorax by thoracoscope operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结电视胸腔镜下治疗自发性气胸的体会。

sentences.english: An exposed ribcage or the exo-skeleton of a Tyrinid monster are good example.
sentences.chinese: 暴露出胸腔跟骨骼的虫族是一个非常好的例子。

sentences.english: Pleural effusion and lobular interstitium thickness.
sentences.chinese: 肺间质增厚和胸腔积液。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the value of video assisted thoracic surgery in lung surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸腔镜手术在胸外科领域的应用价值。

sentences.english: Methods Several detective methods were used to determinate the features of 89 cases of pleural effusions.
sentences.chinese: 方法几种检测方法分别用于89例胸腔积液患者。

definition: diaphragm/also written 橫隔膜|横隔膜[heng2 ge2 mo2]
